snippet: The promotion of independence on college campuses -- in which students are encouraged to express themselves, find their passions, and realize their individual potential -- may be putting some students at an academic disadvantage.
abstract: The promotion of independence on college campuses -- in which students are encouraged to express themselves, find their passions, and realize their individual potential -- may be putting some students at an academic disadvantage.

headline.main: Focus on Independence May Hamper First-Generation Students Once on Campus
